name: NorthPoleLive
0:
”Alexa, open North Pole Live”
”Alexa, ask North Pole Live to connect”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: north pole live
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ever wonder what happens inside Santa's Workshop all year long? Now, you're able to listen in year round and find out what Santa and his elves are doing as they prepare to fly around the world on Christmas eve, delivering toys to children near and far. North Pole Live is an audio feed from inside Santa's Workshop at the North Pole. It takes a lot to power this signal, so you can only listen a few minutes at a time. But you can listen as often as you like!

You'll hear:
Elves chatting with each other as they build toys and games.
Santa stopping by to check on their work.
Announcements over the PA system inside Santa's workshop.
And more!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
